bug.author: bee-san
bug.description: On latest version with file input: python3 -m ciphey - activation.txt Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/lib/python3.8/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main return _run_code(code, main_globals, None, File "/usr/lib/python3.8/runpy.py", line 86, in _run_code exec(code, run_globals) File "/home/kiyoukan/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ciphey/main.py", line 3, in <module> ciphey.main() File "/home/kiyoukan/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 829, in call return self.main(args, kwargs) File "/home/kiyoukan/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 782, in main rv = self.invoke(ctx) File "/home/kiyoukan/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1066, in invoke return ctx.invoke(self.callback, ctx.params) File "/home/kiyoukan/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/click/core.py", line 610, in invoke return callback(args, **kwargs) File "/home/kiyoukan/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/ciphey/ciphey.py", line 255, in main kwargs["text"] = kwargs["file_stdin"].read().decode("utf-8") UnicodeDecodeError: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xf7 in position 8: invalid start byte <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/files/5001605/test.txt>test.txt</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/Ciphey/Ciphey>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
That snippet in main should check if the user has requested binary input
This file doesn't seem to have any hex in it! I'm closing until some expected behaviour can be found
